name: Cyber Stealth
description:
SYNOPSIS:

You play as a man searching through one of the last remaining human districts for supplies. There are 5 glowy sci-fi cubes to be located, but watch out for those evil shooty robots out to kill! 

CONTROLS:

Use 'LMB' to shoot, but don't get trigger happy because there is a cool down after 5 shots. 

Use 'WASD' to move around the map, and 'C' to crouch in the strange foggy cubes distributed throughout the map (the robots can't see you in the shadows)!

PRODUCTION DETAILS:

All buildings/ environment/ props made and textured by me (apart from those listed below). 

Code and mechanics done by Dan Harris: https://danharrisstudent.itch.io/

SPECIAL THANKS TO:

StealthlySloth for his voice: https://stealthysloth.itch.io/
